objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#e6e6e6'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#b3b3b3'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#7d7d7d'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#4d4d4d'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><g opacity='0.7'><rect x='-200' y='180' width='1500' height='40' fill='url(#accentGradient)' transform='rotate(-5)'/><rect x='-200' y='240' width='1500' height='20' fill='url(#accentGradient)' transform='rotate(-5)'/><rect x='-200' y='820' width='1500' height='40' fill='url(#accentGradient)' transform='rotate(5)'/><rect x='-200' y='880' width='1500' height='20' fill='url(#accentGradient)' transform='rotate(5)'/></g><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='60' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='60' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='980' cy='100' r='40' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='100' cy='980' r='40' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/></svg>

objects.text: Digital Controls • Locking Lid • 9+ Person Capacity

product_details.description: Whether you’re feeding friends and family at home, or taking your meal on the go or to an event, the Crockpot 7 QT Cook & Carry Programmable Slow Cooker makes sharing a home-cooked meal with loved ones easy and effortless. The Cook & Carry travel-proof locking lid provides a tight seal to prevent leaks and spills, for no mess on the go, and convenient handles make it easy to carry and take your favorite slow cooked meals anywhere. A digital countdown control allows you to easily program your slow cooker from 30 minutes up to 20 hours. When cooking is completed, temperature automatically shifts to warm mode to avoid overcooking. The digital display also lets you track your meal progress and monitor remaining cook time. With a 7-quart capacity, it cooks meals for 9+ people, perfect for feeding a crowd. When you’re finished slow cooking, both the lid and the stoneware can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleanup.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern product promotion design, mainly showcasing a kitchen appliance. The background utilizes a diagonal gradient from light gray to medium gray, embellished with diagonal stripes and subtle geometric circles for depth and visual interest. The central focus is the product image, aligned in the middle and scaled to emphasize the featured appliance. 

The top section holds a prominent product title (text layer “heading”) in bold dark gray, followed by a secondary subheading (text layer “subheading”) describing the product’s type and features. 

Beneath the image is a descriptive spec text (text layer “description”) detailing key features, styled in a clean sans-serif font. Below that is a bold price callout (text layer “price”) in large dark red text, grabbing attention. Under it, a contrasting rectangular CTA button (layer “cta_background”) with inverse white text (text layer “cta”) encourages immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Gray (#e6e6e6)
- Medium Gray (#b3b3b3)
- Dark Gray (#333333)
- Accent Gray (#4d4d4d)
- Deep Maroon (#5a1e1e)
- White (#ffffff)
product_color: The product image showcases a modern Crockpot slow cooker with a minimalist, professional color palette. Dominated by a sleek matte gray body (#6E6E6E), the product conveys a clean, functional aesthetic. The control panel and display area introduce soft beige (#EAEAEA) and white (#FFFFFF) tones to ensure clear visibility and warmth. Text elements and borders are subtly highlighted in dark gray (#3A3A3A), providing strong contrast without overpowering the design. The transparent glass lid includes light gray-silver accents (#DCDCDC), contributing to the product’s polished look. These colors blend seamlessly, emphasizing functionality while highlighting brand sophistication—ideal for a modern, polished banner theme.
